name: Cast A Life Line
description:
Cast a line to save the pups from being washed down the river!

Controls:

Space - casts out your fishing line, wait for it to return before casting again!

Made in just under 3 hours, really wanted to challenge myself to do a bit of a bigger game than my last attempt so i'm pretty happy with what I got done within the time limit!

All audio used is from Zapsplat!
